channel.title: Vote4Cash error help please!
channel.description:
So i kinda stopped coding for like 7 months .. but i used to always add vote4cash for people so i added it to my new project, and i know i added everything that needs to be added, but i get this error.. any ideas?
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2944639/2012-12-30_11-36_Server.jpg[/img]

item.title: Vote4Cash error help please!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“Extrocity, post:3, topic:477079”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=595272.msg4191546#msg4191546 date=1356887681]
This means the JDBC driver that you’re using with your server cannot connect to the SQL database, where it stores data and what not. You probably mis-typed either the username, password, or IP.
[/quote]
i fixed it, i forgot to allow the ip in the msql database haha. whoopsies![/quote]

Haha, common slip up, goodluck!

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4Cash error help please!
item.dc:creator: @Extrocity Extrocity
item.description:
@Extrocity wrote:

The Web Guy:

This means the JDBC driver that you’re using with your server cannot connect to the SQL database, where it stores data and what not. You probably mis-typed either the username, password, or IP.

i fixed it, i forgot to allow the ip in the msql database haha. whoopsies!

Read full topic
